Spears::

She looked at him and gave him a faint smile. She knew somewhere in 
her spark, he was just trying to give her hope.  But she knew that is 
a bot is totally reprogrammed, then her love was gone. "Thank you."
She looked down. "But I think you were right the first time. He's 
gone. And for good." She couldn't help but let the tears fall again. 
Her spark was broken.  She looked up. "Who did this to him? Who took 
him away from me?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm::
> 
> Firearm looks Spears over, sighing. He couldn't really bring 
himself 
> to tell her that it was probably impossible.
> 
> "There is always a chance," he says, "Even if they cleared his 
> memory, we might be able to restore it."
> 
>
